summary: Results-driven Software Engineer with expertise in full-stack web development and a solid foundation in data science. Proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions using technologies such as React, Python, Django, and Flask. Adept at problem-solving, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and adapting to new technologies.

experiences.title: Associate Software Engineer
responsibilities: Leading the development and maintenance of dynamic web applications using React, Python, Django, and Flask.
Utilizing expertise in Python, Django, and Flask to design and maintain robust backend services.
Crafting and optimizing RESTful APIs to enhance interoperability and support seamless data exchange.
Conducting data analysis and research to inform decision-making processes.
Preparing technical proposals and documentation for clients.
Providing top-tier technical support to clients and collaborating closely with team members to troubleshoot and resolve issues promptly.
Actively contributing to project efficiency and scalability through the creation of automation scripts, process streamlining, and implementation of best practices.
Taking the lead in the preparation and presentation of comprehensive technical reports to clients, demonstrating a strong command of project details and outcomes.
Engaging in system design and architecture to ensure the scalability and maintainability of applications, contributing to overall project success.

experiences.title: IT Support
responsibilities: Delivered exceptional IT support, addressing client technical issues promptly through face-to-face interactions and remote assistance.
Collected and analyzed logs to resolve issues efficiently, ensuring a seamless user experience and minimizing downtime.
Prepared detailed technical reports and proposals for projects and clients, showcasing a strong ability to communicate technical information effectively.
Developed applications for internal use using Python and Flask, demonstrating versatility and a hands-on approach to problem-solving.
Played a key role in talking clients through a series of actions, either face-to-face or over the phone, to set up systems or resolve issues, fostering positive client relationships.
Contributed to the efficiency of internal processes by developing applications for automation using Python, Flask, Numpy, and Pandas.
